meanings.definition: To discover or find out something together with someone else.
meanings.sent1: She codiscovers new places with her best friend.
meanings.sent2: The team codiscovers hidden treasures in the jungle.
meanings.sent3: The siblings codiscovers a secret passage in the old house.
meanings.sent4: The detective codiscovers the truth behind the mysterious case.
meanings.sent5: The scientists codiscovers a new species of plant in the rainforest.

meanings.definition: The act of discovering or finding out something together with someone else.
meanings.sent1: Their codiscovers led to exciting adventures.
meanings.sent2: The codiscovers of the explorers were well-documented.
meanings.sent3: The codiscovers at the museum were always full of surprises.
meanings.sent4: Her codiscovers with friends made her childhood memorable.
meanings.sent5: The codiscovers of the archaeologists changed history books.
